Your Location: This is your detected location based on GPS and reverse geocoding.
Current Time: The current local time based on the latest weather data timestamp.
Temperature: The current temperature in Celsius degrees. High temperatures may indicate heat warnings.
Wind Speed: Current wind speed in kilometers per hour. Strong winds can be dangerous.
Condition: Current weather condition such as clear, rainy, cloudy, or thunderstorms.
Danger Level: A calculated danger level based on temperature and wind speed to help you stay safe.
